attributes.action: provide better funding for university students taking degrees with more costs assigned to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many degrees will be manageable under the current funding provided by the government. However, students of art, for example, must find the money to buy their materials, and law students must pay out hundreds of pounds for endless, expensive books. Should the amount provided, therefore, not be in relation to the expenses?
